memory.title: Waking Up Confused
memory.memory: I woke up this morning and couldn't remember yesterday again. I don't understand why this keeps happening to me. I feel scared and confused.

memory.title: Reading My Diary
memory.memory: I read my diary and saw entries I wrote yesterday but don't remember writing. It's like someone else wrote them. I'm trying to understand what's happening to me.

memory.title: Diary Entry About Kamiya
memory.memory: In my diary, I wrote about meeting a boy named Kamiya Tooru yesterday. He joined our literature club and seemed interested in me. I don't remember meeting him, but my diary says he was kind and liked photography.

memory.title: Family Support
memory.memory: My parents helped me understand what day it is and what I need to do today. They seem to know something about my situation but I'm too confused to ask questions.

memory.title: Getting Ready for School
memory.memory: I'm getting ready for school. I know I'm a high school student and I love literature. I'm trying to focus on what I can remember and not think about what I can't. I wonder if I'll see Kamiya today.
